column7: how much does it cost to homeschool

column2: Article should contain the following sections:  <h2> Is Homeschooling Right for You? <h2> What to Consider When Starting Homeschooling <h2> Homeschooling Costs and Reimbursements <h2> How to Homeschool in Your State <h3> How to Homeschool in [State]* <h2> How to Homeschool FAQs  Include additional sections/visual/podcasts throughout to further explain and answer common questions about homeschooling. This article should be written in an unbiased, informative tone while nudging the reader towards OpenEd services. Future OpenEd-state specific content can be more salesy.  Rec word count: 1000-1500   *Ideally we include the largest search volume states: CA, TX, FL, NY, NC, PA and the states OpenEd is offered. We will build out individual pages for OpenEd states.

Best Homeschool Math Curriculum for Your Students

Article should contain the following sections:  <h2> Understanding Homeschool Math Curriculum <h2> [Level] Homeschool Curriculum* <h2> Homeschool [Type] Curriculum** <h2> Free Homeschool Math Curriculum <h2> Tips for Homeschooling Math   Include links to actual tools/curriculum OpenEd partners with and industry resources. The goal of this piece is to be as helpful as possible to anyone looking for math curriculum. It's OK to mention competitors.  Rec word count: 2000+  *Add grade levels: kindergarten, elementary, middle, high  **Add relevant types such as algebra
